Class JsonUtils

java.lang.Object
coffee.khyonieheart.hyacinth.util.JsonUtils
public class JsonUtils extends Object
Various utilities for reading and writing .json files.

    • fromJson

      @Nullable public static <T> T fromJson(@NotNull String path, @NotNull Class<T> type) throws FileNotFoundException
      Deserializes an object from a .json file.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of object
      Parameters:
      path - Filepath to .json file
      type - Class of object
      Returns:
      An object read from the given file. May return null if the file cannot be read.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - When a file does not exist at the given path.
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • fromJson

      @Nullable public static <T> T fromJson(@NotNull String path, @NotNull Type type) throws FileNotFoundException
      Deserializes an object from a .json file, with support for interface types in java.lang.reflect.Type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of object
      Parameters:
      path - Filepath to .json file
      type - Type of object, see com.google.gson.reflect.TypeToken
      Returns:
      An object read from the given file. May return null if the file cannot be read.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - When a file does not exist at the given path.
      Since:
      1.0.0

      Parameters:

    • toFile

      @NotNull public static File toFile(@NotNull String path, @NotNull Object object)
      Serializes an object and saves it to a .json file.
      Parameters:
      path - Filepath to write to
      object - Object to serialize
      Returns:
      The file that was written to
